Key Match Events: Kyrie Irving logged 28 minutes in the contest, tallying 17 points, two rebounds, three assists, two steals, and only one turnover while shooting 5-for-11 from the field, 1-for-2 from three, and 6-for-7 at the charity stripe.
Dereck Lively II recorded his second double-double for the 2024-25 Mavs with 11 points, 11 boards, and one dime, shooting 5-for-7 from the field and 1-for-3 at the line.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paolo Banchero is out indefinitely with a torn right oblique.
Wendell Carter Jr. played only nine minutes before exiting with a left foot injury.
